name: Food Fight?
description:
My first FPS! Food themed wave defending FPS. Disassemble weird food enemies into delicious dishes that gives temporary buff.

Music by: https://soundcloud.com/lee-ying-shen

Recipes:

Dish Ingredient Effects Duration(s)   Banana Fritters + 3 Heal + 3 Max Health 15   Chips and Salsa   + 1 Heal + 5 Damage 15   Chicken Fried Steak     +5 Heal +5 Max Health +5 Damage + 20 Attack Speed 25   Grilled Cheese      + 3 Heal + 15 Attack Speed 18    Salad     + 5 Heal + 5 Max Health 20

HOW TO PLAY

Button - Starts the wave. PRESS AGAIN TO START NEXT WAVE INSTANTLY

Cooking Station - Throw the ingredient into this magic oven

Weapon Selector - Choose your weapon. You can replenish your ammo here too.

Enemies:

Boomger - Boom!

Banana Bread -grunts  of the Bread Mafia

Ducko - The Taco Duck
